question_text: Which of the following statements best describes a community cloud?
answer_options: It is managed by a public cloud vendor for use by all customers
It is designed for temporary disaster recovery use only
It is shared among several organizations with similar needs or goals
It allows simultaneous access to hybrid and public resources
correct_answer: It is shared among several organizations with similar needs or goals
explanation: Community clouds serve multiple organizations that share costs, infrastructure, or compliance objectives.
